  • Method Details

    • getConfiguration

      org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns:
      Gets the configuration of the menu.

    • getFileName

      String getFileName()
      Returns:
      The name of the configuration file associated to the menu.

    • getMenuName

      String getMenuName()
      Returns:
      The menu name used for identification.

    • build

      void build (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nullable @Nullable String... searchText)
      Builds and opens the menu using a defined search text alongside the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to base properties around.
      searchText - The searched text, if applicable.

    • buildButton

      void buildButton (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection mainSection, @NotNull @NotNull String buttonAction, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, @Nullable @Nullable List<Integer> emptySlots, @Nullable @Nullable String... extraPlaceHolders)
      Builds a particular button in a specific location given some parameters.
      Parameters:
      mainSection - The buttons section of the menus config.
      buttonAction - The button name.
      player - The player to associate placeholders to.
      inventory - The inventory to build the button into.
      shop - The shop to base placeholders on.
      emptySlots - The slots that are restricted from usage.
      extraPlaceHolders - Additional placeholders that will be replaced in the format "{placeholder}:{text}".

    • isFillerItem

      boolean isFillerItem (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack itemStack)
      Compares an itemstack to the menu's filler item.
      Parameters:
      itemStack - The item to compare.
      Returns:
      Whether the itemstack is similar to the filler item.

    • matches

      boolean matches (@NotNull @NotNull String title)
      Checks if a title matches the title of the menu.
      Parameters:
      title - The title to compare.
      Returns:
      Whether the title matches the menu's title.

    • getButtonName

      String getButtonName (int slot)
      Gets the name of the button from the slot provided.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot to look for.
      Returns:
      The name of the button, if found.

    • switchPage

      void switchPage (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int page)
      Switch the current page to the specified page.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The inventory of to update for the selected page.
      player - The player to switch the page for.
      page - The page to switch to.

    • loadPages

      void loadPages (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull DataPack dataPack, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, @Nullable @Nullable String searchText, @Nullable @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack typeItem, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
      Load pages based on specific attributes alongside filter text.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to create pages for.
      dataPack - The player's datapack.
      shop - The shop the player has currently selected.
      searchText - The filter text to filter the items by.
      typeItem - The type item used to filter shops by what actions can be performed.
      inventory - The inventory to load the page into.

    • updateButton

      void updateButton (@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory, int slot, @Nullable @Nullable Shop shop, @Nullable @Nullable List<Integer> emptySlots, @Nullable @Nullable String... extraPlaceHolders)
      Update the button based on specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to update the button for.
      inventory - The inventory (menu) to update it in.
      slot - The slot to update the button at.
      shop - The shop to update the button for, if available.
      emptySlots - The empty slots to base it around.
      extraPlaceHolders - Additional placeholders that will be replaced in the format "{placeholder}:{text}".

    • getFile

      File getFile()
      Returns:
      The configuration file associated to the menu.

    • save

      void save()
      Saves the configuration file to the disk.

    • reload

      void reload()
      Reloads the configuration file from disk.

    • getButtonLocationMap

      HashMap<Integer,String> getButtonLocationMap()
      Returns:
      The map of buttons alongside their placement for the menu.
